aboutSection.title: About ✨ Luxe Beauty Salon
aboutSection.content: With over 15 years of experience, we are dedicated to providing world-class beauty and wellness services. Our team of certified professionals uses premium products and cutting-edge techniques to ensure you look and feel your absolute best. From precision haircuts to rejuvenating spa treatments, every service is tailored to your unique needs.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Absolutely amazing! The staff is incredibly professional and the atmosphere is so relaxing. My facial treatment was beyond expectations!

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.comment: Best beauty salon experience I've ever had! The attention to detail and customer service is outstanding. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Emma Williams
reviews.comment: The massage was incredibly relaxing and therapeutic. The ambiance and professionalism here is unmatched!
